summary: Central estimate ~$4,200-4,400M based on multiple approaches: QoQ growth, YoY growth, seasonal patterns, and full-year guidance constraints
content:
Quarterly Zepbound revenue (M USD): Q1'24:517, Q2'24:1243, Q3'24:1258, Q4'24:1907, Q1'25:2312, Q2'25:3381, Q3'25:3588. 

Key patterns: Q3→Q4 seasonal uplift (+51.6% in 2024), YoY growth decelerating (347%→172%→185%). Full-year 2025 Lilly guidance: $63-63.5B (raised after Q3 beat). Earnings date: Feb 4, 2026. No pre-announcement warning found. Zepbound price cuts announced Dec 2025. Multiple estimation approaches converge on ~$4,200-4,400M central estimate.
